definition: to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
to lead to death/to result in death
Death note (Japanese: デスノート), translation of cult manga series by author ŌBA Tsugumi 大場鶇|大场鸫[Da4 chang3 Dong1] (pen-name) and illustrator OBATA Takeshi 小畑健[Xiao3 tian2 Jian4]

sentences.english: Two cases of cholera, one of which has ended fatally, have occurred here.
sentences.chinese: 這裏發生過兩起霍亂病例，其中一人已經死亡。

sentences.english: The main reason of death was hemorrhagic shock.
sentences.chinese: 失血性休克是死亡的主要原因。

sentences.english: China has reported 1, 537 cases of swine flu with no fatalities to date.
sentences.chinese: 中國迄今共報告了1537例甲流，沒有死亡病例。

sentences.english: One was the discovery by Allied troops of the German death camps.
sentences.chinese: 一個是發現由德國死亡集中營盟軍部隊。

sentences.english: This initiative helped improve registration of births and deaths at the subdistrict level.
sentences.chinese: 這一舉措幫助改善了街道一級的出生和死亡登記。

sentences.english: Perhaps you can explain why the Dustmen want me dead.
sentences.chinese: 也許你能解釋死亡者想要殺死我的原因。

sentences.english: Only 8 of the 58 present at the uncovering of the tomb died within a dozen years.
sentences.chinese: 58人中只有8人在挖墓後的十幾年內死亡。

sentences.english: The accident of aortic cannulation is very dangerous and the mortality of this complication is quite high.
sentences.chinese: 主動脈插管意外極爲兇險，死亡率非常高。
那就別再說什麼死亡了。

sentences.english: Ninety-five percent of cheetah cubs die before reaching independence.
sentences.chinese: 95%的獵豹幼崽在能夠獨立生存之前死亡。

sentences.english: This is the phobia or fear of death as such or any dead objects.
sentences.chinese: 這種恐懼症的源頭是對死亡或者屍體的害怕。

sentences.english: So he can't know, yet, that death doesn't really mean anything in comics.
sentences.chinese: 因而至今他也不知道死亡在漫畫中沒什麼實際意義。
但是，我們能夠欺騙死亡嗎？

sentences.english: Real-life details fill these books of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 真實的生活細節在這些死亡之書中隨處可見。

sentences.english: Like humans, marmosets that die from the disease do so within 20 days of becoming ill.
sentences.chinese: 如同人類，絨猴患病後的20天內將會死亡。

definition: to lead to death/to result in death
to kill oneself/to commit suicide/to attempt suicide
life (as the characteristic of living beings)/living being/creature/CL:個|个[ge4],條|条[tiao2]
to sustain injuries/wounded (in an accident etc)/harmed
